## AuthStatus interface

Exposes the authentication status

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AuthStatus 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [authenticated$](./api.authstatus.authenticated_.md) | <code>Observable&lt;boolean&gt;</code> | Exposes the flag that tells if the system is authenticated. This is e.g. used to decide to use the <code>delivery</code> or <code>mydelivery</code> routes. |
